scripts.db:init: npm run db:setup-function && npm run db:setup-schema
scripts.db:setup-function: node -e "require('dotenv').config()); const { createClient } = require('@supabase/supabase-js'); const fs = require('fs'); const supabase = createClient(process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL, process.env.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY); const sql = fs.readFileSync('lib/setup-supabase.sql', 'utf8'); supabase.from('_root').select('*').limit(1).then(() => { console.log('Executing setup-supabase.sql...'); supabase.rpc('pg_query', { query: sql }).catch(e => console.log('Creating initial pg_query function...'));}).catch(e => console.error('Error:', e))"
